AU.name: GRADIUS
AU.description: The planet of Gradius is doomed. Only you, at the helm of the prototype Vic Viper fighter, can save Gradius and the galaxy from the evil Bacterions. The first in the classic series, Gradius introduced the now familiar system of collecting capsules to boost your ship's abilities; missiles, increased speed, laser beam, force field and more. You must use your skills as a pilot and choose your weapons wisely, as you face off against waves of enemies and enormous bosses. Never forget: shoot the core!

BG.name: GRADIUS
BG.description: The planet of Gradius is doomed. Only you, at the helm of the prototype Vic Viper fighter, can save Gradius and the galaxy from the evil Bacterions. The first in the classic series, Gradius introduced the now familiar system of collecting capsules to boost your ship's abilities; missiles, increased speed, laser beam, force field and more. You must use your skills as a pilot and choose your weapons wisely, as you face off against waves of enemies and enormous bosses. Never forget: shoot the core!

FR.name: GRADIUS
FR.description: La planète Gradius est condamnée. Vous êtes le seul à pouvoir sauver Gradius et la galaxie des malfaisants Bactérions. Pour cela, il vous faudra prendre les commandes du prototype hyperespace, Vic Viper. Gradius est le premier jeu de la série à introduire les désormais célèbres systèmes de collecte de capsules qui vous permettent d'améliorer votre vaisseau en augmentant sa vitesse, en l'équipant d'un rayon laser, d'un champ de force ou de missiles, et plus encore. Il vous faudra utiliser vos talents de pilote et choisir soigneusement vos armes pour affronter les vagues d'ennemis et les gigantesques boss. Un conseil : visez dans le mille !

HU.name: GRADIUS
HU.description: The planet of Gradius is doomed. Only you, at the helm of the prototype Vic Viper fighter, can save Gradius and the galaxy from the evil Bacterions. The first in the classic series, Gradius introduced the now familiar system of collecting capsules to boost your ship's abilities; missiles, increased speed, laser beam, force field and more. You must use your skills as a pilot and choose your weapons wisely, as you face off against waves of enemies and enormous bosses. Never forget: shoot the core!

IT.name: GRADIUS
IT.description: Il mondo di Gradius è sull'orlo della distruzione! Solo tu, ai comandi del prototipo Vic Viper, puoi salvare il pianeta e la galassia intera dai terribili Bacterion. Primo capitolo di una serie entrata nell'olimpo dei grandi classici, Gradius è il primo sparatutto ad aver introdotto la familiare meccanica dei potenziamenti da raccogliere durante il volo. Potrai acquisire nuove armi, come missili e raggio laser, un potente campo di forza, nonché rendere la tua astronave ancora più veloce. Affidati alla tua abilità di pilota e scegli bene le tue armi nell'affrontare ondate di alieni e pericolosi boss. Ricorda: mira al nucleo!

HR.name: GRADIUS
HR.description: The planet of Gradius is doomed. Only you, at the helm of the prototype Vic Viper fighter, can save Gradius and the galaxy from the evil Bacterions. The first in the classic series, Gradius introduced the now familiar system of collecting capsules to boost your ship's abilities; missiles, increased speed, laser beam, force field and more. You must use your skills as a pilot and choose your weapons wisely, as you face off against waves of enemies and enormous bosses. Never forget: shoot the core!

ES.name: GRADIUS
ES.description: El planeta Gradius está en peligro. Solo tú, a bordo del cazabombardero Vic Viper, puedes salvar al planeta y a toda la galaxia de la invasión de los malvados Bacterions. Gradius, el primero de la clásica colección de juegos, nos presenta por primera vez el ahora popular sistema de acumulación de cápsulas para mejorar las habilidades de tu nave y conseguir, entre otros, misiles, mayor velocidad, disparos láser o campos de fuerza. Usa tus conocimientos de pilotaje y elige sabiamente tus armas para derrotar a oleadas de enemigos y jefes muy poderosos. No olvides esto: ¡apunta bien y vencerás!

GR.name: GRADIUS
GR.description: The planet of Gradius is doomed. Only you, at the helm of the prototype Vic Viper fighter, can save Gradius and the galaxy from the evil Bacterions. The first in the classic series, Gradius introduced the now familiar system of collecting capsules to boost your ship's abilities; missiles, increased speed, laser beam, force field and more. You must use your skills as a pilot and choose your weapons wisely, as you face off against waves of enemies and enormous bosses. Never forget: shoot the core!

CH.name: GRADIUS
CH.description: Der Planet Gradius ist dem Untergang geweiht. Nur du kannst Gradius und die Galaxie vor den bösartigen Bacterions beschützen, indem du dich ins Cockpit deines Vic Viper-Kampfjägers schwingst. Der erste Teil der klassischen Gradius-Reihe führte das heutzutage vertraute System ein: Sammle Energiekapseln ein, um schneller zu werden oder Extrawaffen wie Laser, Raketen und Kraftfelder zu aktivieren. Du musst dein Können als Pilot und deine Waffen geschickt einsetzen, während du es mit Wellen von Gegnern und mit gewaltigen Endgegnern aufnimmst. Nicht vergessen: feuere auf den Kern!

NL.name: GRADIUS
NL.description: De planeet Gradius is ten dode opgeschreven. Alleen jij, met je handen aan de stuurknuppel van het Vic Viper-prototype, kan de planeet en de Melkweg redden van de Bacterions. Dit eerste deel in de klassieke Gradius-reeks introduceerde het nu bekende systeem waarbij de speler capsules verzamelt om de vaardigheden van zijn ruimteschip te verbeteren: snelheid, laserstraal, raketten, krachtvelden en meer! Kies de juiste wapens en haal alles uit de kast om de constante stroom van vijanden en enorme eindbazen af te slaan. Vergeet niet: schiet op de kern!

PT.name: GRADIUS
PT.description: O planeta Gradius está condenado. Apenas tu, ao comando do protótipo do caça Vic Viper, poderás salvar Gradius e a galáxia dos maléficos Bacterions. Gradius, o primeiro jogo desta série clássica, introduziu um sistema agora familiar de recolher cápsulas para dinamizar as capacidades da tua nave, tais como mísseis, aumento de velocidade, raios laser, campos de força, entre outros. Terás de utilizar as tuas habilidades como piloto e escolher as tuas armas com sabedoria, à medida que enfrentas ondas de inimigos e vilões gigantescos. Nunca te esqueças: acerta no centro do alvo!
